news.title: TREE PLANTING 2025
news.summary: NAESS Shipping Philippines Inc. successfully planted 1000 Nara seedlings...
news.content: NAESS Shipping Philippines Inc. successfully planted 1000 Nara seedlings in collaboration with DENR-CENRO Guiguinto, Bulacan, as part of our commitment to environmental stewardship under PPA Administrative Order No. 14-2020. This initiative took place at  Ipo Dam, Mt. Balagbag, Montalban, Rizal on 15 March 2025. Together, we're working to restore and protect nature for generations to come.
news.author: Marketing Team

news.title: PMMA ALUMNI HOMECOMING 2025

news.content: NAESS Shipping Philippines Inc. at the PMMA Alumni Homecoming 2025 – attended by Operations Manager, Robinson Mandalones. Business Development Associate, Catrin Nombres and Recruitment Processor, Candie Salazar.
news.author: Finance Department

news.title: FLU VACCINE ACTIVITY
news.summary: NAESS crew and its employees actively participated in the Joint Flu Vaccination Activity at...
news.content: NAESS crew and its employees actively participated in the Joint Flu Vaccination Activity at the Dr. Mario S. Oca Memorial Hall, AMOSUP Seamen’s Hospital-Manila. A unified effort to promote wellness and protect the workforce—ensuring a healthier and safer future for all!
news.author: IT Department

news.title: CASE HANDLING POLICY AND PROCEDURE ORIENTATION
news.summary: NAESS Shipping Philippines Inc. alongside its Managers kicks off an insightful Orientation/Overview session...
news.content: NAESS Shipping Philippines Inc. alongside its Managers kicks off an insightful Orientation/Overview session, led by PANDIPHIL to provide key industry insights on matters relating to P&I case handling, policy and procedure.
news.author: IT Department

news.title: Company Achieves Carbon Neutrality
news.summary: We"re proud to announce that we"ve achieved carbon neutrality across all our operations globally.
news.content: We"re proud to announce that we"ve achieved carbon neutrality across all our operations globally. This milestone represents years of dedicated effort to reduce our environmental footprint through energy efficiency measures, renewable energy adoption, and strategic carbon offset investments. Moving forward, we"re committed to maintaining this status and working towards more ambitious sustainability goals, including zero waste operations by 2030 and helping our customers reduce their own environmental impact through our products and services.
news.author: Sustainability Team

news.title: Product Training Webinar
news.summary: Join our product specialists for a comprehensive training session on our latest software release.
news.content: Join our product specialists for a comprehensive training session on our latest software release. This webinar will cover new features, best practices, and tips for maximizing value from our platform. We"ll demonstrate several real-world use cases and provide participants with access to additional resources to support their ongoing learning. There will also be a live Q&A session where you can get answers to your specific questions from our product experts.

news.title: New Partnership Announced
news.summary: We"re excited to announce a strategic partnership with InnovateTech to expand our market reach.
news.content: We"re excited to announce a strategic partnership with InnovateTech to expand our market reach. This collaboration will combine our industry-leading solutions with InnovateTech"s advanced technology platform, creating a more comprehensive offering for our joint customers. The partnership includes co-development of new features, integrated product roadmaps, and joint go-to-market strategies. Early pilots with select customers have shown promising results, with simplified workflows and enhanced capabilities.
news.author: Business Development Team

news.title: Industry Networking Mixer
news.summary: An evening of networking with industry peers, featuring refreshments and a panel discussion.
news.content: An evening of networking with industry peers, featuring refreshments and a panel discussion. This relaxed event provides a perfect opportunity to connect with other professionals in your field, share experiences, and discover potential collaboration opportunities. The panel discussion will explore current industry trends and future predictions, with plenty of time for audience questions and discussion. Attendance is limited to ensure quality interactions, so early registration is recommended.

clients.name: Kuwait Oil Tanker Company
clients.description: The Company is mainly involved in the ownership and management of tankers engaged in the transport of crude oil, refined petroleum products and liquefied petroleum gases (LPG). In addition, it also operates a Marine Agency Branch, acting as sole agent of all tankers calling at Kuwait's sea port and a Gas Branch for the filling and distribution of LPG cylinders for local industry and domestic consumption. As the transportation arm of KPC it operates, on a commercial basis, a modern balanced fleet of Very Large Crude Carriers (VLCCs), petroleum product tankers and LPG carriers to maintain a strategic coverage of KPC's oil exports to all corners of the globe. In spite of the general slackness conditions in the tankers industry all over the world during the current years, KOTC managed to keep its profitability above the regular average due to its intensive concern for reducing the operating expenses and its wise policy of replacing old ships at the appropriate times.

clients.name: Reefership Marine Services Ltd
clients.description: The exclusive maritime transportation provider for Dole Fresh Fruit Co., and Dole Ocean Cargo Express, the commercial cargo subsidiary of Dole. Although incorporated in 1999 as Reefership Marine Services Ltd, the technical management staff of RMS have been responsible for Dole's fleet since 1986. Dole's fleet of vessels consist of conventional refrigerated pallet and refrigerated container vessels, the largest such dedicated refrigerated containerized fleet in the world.

clients.name: Sloman Neptun Schiffahrts AG
clients.description: Over 135 years of shipping experience, where professionals stand ready to solve all your transportation needs. Twenty-two modern tankers serve the global gas- and product oil markets, while four multipurpose vessels connect North Africa and other Mediterranean ports with Northern Europe through a scheduled liner service.

clients.name: Associated Marine Officers and Seamen's Union of the Philippines
clients.description: This company is a prominent union for Filipino seafarers, dedicated to safeguarding their rights and improving their working conditions. Established in the mid-20th century, the union champions the welfare of its members by offering a broad range of services, including legal support, health care, comprehensive training, and career development programs. Its mission extends beyond workplace advocacy to include robust community and family support initiatives, ensuring that both seafarers and their loved ones receive essential benefits and protections.

testimonials.name: John Doe
testimonials.text: Joining this company was one of the best decisions of my career. The collaborative environment and growth opportunities are unmatched!

testimonials.name: Jane Doe
testimonials.text: I've never worked anywhere that values creativity and innovation as much as this company. Every day brings new challenges and opportunities to learn.

testimonials.name: John Weck
testimonials.text: The supportive culture here has helped me develop both professionally and personally. I feel valued and empowered to contribute my best work.

faqs.question: What is the hiring process like?
faqs.answer: Our hiring process typically involves an initial screening call, followed by a technical or role-specific assessment, and then 2-3 interviews with team members and leadership. The entire process usually takes 2-3 weeks.

faqs.question: Do you offer relocation assistance?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer relocation packages for certain roles. The specifics depend on the position and location, but our HR team will discuss details with qualified candidates.

faqs.question: Can I work remotely?
faqs.answer: Many of our positions offer remote work options. Each job posting specifies whether the role is remote, hybrid, or on-site. We're committed to flexible work arrangements where possible.

faqs.question: What growth opportunities are available?
faqs.answer: We believe in promoting from within and offer clear career progression paths. We provide regular feedback, mentorship programs, and learning budgets to support your professional development.

faqs.question: How often do you hire new team members?
faqs.answer: We're constantly growing and hire year-round as needs arise. Even if you don't see a perfect match for your skills right now, we encourage you to submit your resume for future opportunities.
